title: Naisho No Otome Revolver
alternative_title: ないしょの乙女リボルバー ; 左轮公主 ; Secret Maiden Revolver
status: ないしょの乙女リボルバー ; 左轮公主 ; Secret Maiden Revolver
description:
Description :
        Short synopsis: Think "Kampfer" meets "Infinite Stratos"
Long synposis: The story is about a High School student named Lihau Yuexiang/Tachibana who's goal is to be recognized as a manly man. The problem is that he looks exactly like a girl and is constantly bullied by his peers because of this. He is gifted the power to become a gunner princess fighter and hopes to use this newfound strength to prevent the bullying and finally become manly.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 7 : Omake No Revolver - Hinata S First Time With Underwear
Chapter 5 : Final Secret - The Legendary Ability
Chapter 4 : Drums, Me, And The Roof
Chapter 1 : I M A Manly Man
